title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 28.5 - The new york city community preservation corporation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 28.5 - The new york city community preservation corporation

State Regulations

The limitations and restrictions of Banking Law, section
103(4), shall not apply to collateral trust notes issued by the The New York

City Community Preservation Corporation which notes have been issued pursuant
to, and have terms substantially similar to those set forth in an indenture
that shall have received the prior specific approval of the superintendent or
to the mortgages or other liens securing said notes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
28.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
